name: Risto Alanko
goal: To promote the interests of European metal-, engineering- and technology based industries in the EU in order to strengthen the competitiveness of the industry for the benefit of European economy and employment and secure fair competitive environment on global markets.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Better Regulation Agenda and the REFIT Platform work and the submissions and actions by Commission to reduce administrative and regulatory burden.
